boat.full_description: Built in Cornwall in 1987 Clara was previously owned by a couple in Georgia, USA then sold to a gentleman in Florida who had it only a couple of years. Its current owner purchased it in 2021 and has sailed it ever since on the Hudson River in New York, USA. How she arrived here from Britain is a mystery. Clara was not her original name, I only know this because as the nameplate began to wear away I could see another name underneath but was unable to decipher it.
boat.name: Clara
boat.note: Photos pending assignment to album by OGA admin
boat.short_description: Cornish Crabber mark II gaff rigged cutter with a jackyard topsail.
